column4: what driver do i need for 01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: ATI Technologies Inc RV350 AP [Radeon 9600]
01:00.1 Display controller: ATI Technologies Inc RV350 AP [Radeon 9600] (Secondary)
cause i cant find anything ati in the repos
do you not get an icon in your taskbar asking if you want to use the proprietary ati driver?
hang on I'll find the name of the driver
I was just going to tell you to install xorg-driver-fglrx    :p
are your keys normal outside of terminal?
you can't login to a desktop environment?
it may be the setting in /etc/fstab for keyboard, it should be pc104 (assuming you are in the US)
/etc/X11/xorg.conf is also probably where you'll fix your graphics, and probably whatever happened to change the keyboard type is also what broke the driver
